text: before we moved to the cloud
we were running in a traditional data
center we have
uh we had oracle exadata running oracle
products within it we had sun solar
servers
a lot of physical servers we had a
fairly significant
virtual environment based on vmware
products
the biggest challenge i would say is
the stability within the environment the
data center itself
need a lot of investment our speed and
agility also was not there
we needed to be in an environment where
we could deploy applications much faster
and be able to sustain them
much faster with aws and with cloud we
were able to migrate
160 applications in a matter of eight
months
so we had a mandate where we had to exit
the data center and we had a decision to
make at the time
so we either continue to build out a new
data center
or move completely to the cloud so we
took a stand where we want to go to
cloud first and cloud native we use a
numerous
number of aws services starting from
networking
and also the ec2 set of services for
networking
we're one of the early adopters for
transit gateway and we also use many
partners
with aws for example vmware cloud we use
vmware sddc on top of aws
in fact our migration was made a lot
smoother as a result
of that the implementation has actually
been very fantastic
and it has been a game changer for us
because it has allowed us to start to
unlock
our ability to deliver business value
much much faster
